```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
listings <- read.csv("Cleaned_listings_Beijing.csv", header = TRUE) #can read the file directly only if it is in the same folder
names(listings) #list all variables
head_10<- head(listings, n = 10)
```
##### data cleaning 
###### getting park out of amenities
```{r}
data <- listings %>%
select(neighbourhood_cleansed,room_type,accommodates,square_feet,extra_people,minimum_nights,instant_bookable, amenities, price) %>%
  mutate(parking = str_detect(amenities, "park"))
```
###### getting rid of dollar signs

```{r}
data$price_2 = gsub("\\$","",data$price)
data$extra_people_2 = gsub("\\$","",data$extra_people)
```

##### regression models 

```{r}
mod1 <- lm(price_2~parking,data) #couldn't run
summary(mod1)
```
